1.0.name: wordpress/utility
1.0.description: A Free WordPress theme designed by blitzthemes.com is stylish, customizable, simple, and readable. It has 3 widget areas, theme options, custom menu, slider, a photoblogging layout, news-ticker, dynamic header for custom logo, custom background and featured images (thumbnails for gallery posts and custom size images for posts).
